args.info: String or Array of JSON Objects. If you are tracking a single term, then the keyword itself is suffice otherwise, tracking multiple terms must be in JSON form. Which results in filtering tweets containing 'http://google.com' OR '#test' AND 'test2'. (NOTE) Make sure to URL encode the terms value for multiple terms.
